 Factors conducive to good health:
✱ A healthy lifestyle can prevent many illnesses or delay the 
onset and severity of existing ailments . 
✱ If the person maintains good health, he/she is less likely to 
fall sick. However, if illness does occur, self care with proper management, including medical care where necessary, can help the body heal itself.
✱ With self-care, we can take charge of our health to a great extent and lead an active, healthy life!
